## Voice.getCalls() method

Get a list of existing calls, ongoing and pending. This will not return any call that has finished.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCalls(): Promise<ReadonlyMap<Uuid, Call>>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;ReadonlyMap&lt;Uuid, [Call](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_class.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

A `Promise` that - Resolves with a mapping of `Uuid`<!-- -->s to [Call](./twilio-voice-react-native.call_class.md)<!-- -->s.
